name: Voxel Interceptor
description: Now you can select your control style in 3 different ways!. 6 different upgradeable space interceptors, 9 different weapons. You can supply in your carrier and upgrade her defenses. Shoot enemies down. That's all.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo / Athron64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c support (512 MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD multicore processor recently 2 years Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD in recently 2 years DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c support
